if(!descendingfromcontinue()) { var randnum = [for(i in 0...(diceranges.length / 2) - 1) i * 2]; randnum = rand(randnum); rangename = diceranges[randnum]; rangearray = diceranges[randnum + 1]; Rules.playerdicerange(rangearray); } else { trace(Rules.rulescreen_text[3].split(~[yellow]~).join(~~).split(~[]~).join(~~)); rangename = Rules.rulescreen_text[3].split(~[yellow]~).join(~~).split(~[]~).join(~~).split(~ (~)[0]; rangearray = diceranges[diceranges.indexOf(rangename) + 1]; Rules.playerdicerange(rangearray); } Rules.rulescreen_text = [~h1~ + ~#~.substr(0|1) + ~Platonic Archetypes of Dice~|~~|~You currently have the following dice range:~|~~]; Rules.rulescreen_text[3] += ~[yellow]~ + rangename + ~[] (~ + rangearray[0] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[1] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[2] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[3] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[4] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[5] + ~)~;

Description: Not only are the statuses all different[;]|but the generator is completely broken!
Rules Description: Status effects work differently.|All equipment[;] including starter gear[;] is randomized.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|[]|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'|'testitem'|'unfinished']))[;]~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|[]|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']))]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'|'testitem'|'unfinished']))[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.setalternate(~all~);  Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~inventor5~));  if(getequipmentlist(self).length > 0 && getequipmentlist(self)[0] == ~Equipment That Does Nothing~) {  trace(~giving equips~);    var randeqa = null; /*hammer equivalent*/  var randeqb = null; /*pea shooter equivalent*/  var randeqc = null; /*spanner equivalent*/    var allequipmentlarge = shuffle(getequipmentlist(null|['large']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']));  var allequipmentsmall = shuffle(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']));    var randeqadescriptioncheck = false;    while(randeqa == null # (   (    !randeqadescriptioncheck   ) # (    randeqa.getslots()[0] != 'NORMAL'   ) # (    (     randeqa.script.indexOf('attack(') == -1 #     randeqa.script.split('attack(-').join('').indexOf('attack(') == -1    ) && (     randeqa.script.indexOf('drain(') == -1    )   )  )) {   if(allequipmentlarge.length == 0) trace('hammer failed');   randeqadescriptioncheck = false;   randeqa = new elements.Equipment(allequipmentlarge.pop());   if(    randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf('On ') != -1 #    randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf(' on ') != -1 #    randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf('#'.substr(0|1) + 'on ') != -1   ) {    for(thing in ['6'|'5'|'4'|'3'|'2'|'1'|'<d6>']) {     if(      randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf('On ' + thing + '[' + ';]') != -1 #      randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf(' on ' + thing + '[' + ';]') != -1 #      randeqa.fulldescription.indexOf('#'.substr(0|1) + 'on ' + thing + '[' + ';]') != -1     ) {      randeqadescriptioncheck = true;      break;     }    }   }  }    while(randeqb == null # (   (    (randeqb.countdown <= 0 # randeqb.countdown == null # randeqb.countdown > 6) #    randeqb.usesleft == 0   ) # (    (     randeqb.script.indexOf('attack(') == -1 #     randeqb.script.split('attack(-').join('').indexOf('attack(') == -1    ) && (     randeqb.script.indexOf('drain(') == -1)    )   )  ) {     if(allequipmentsmall.length == 0) trace('pea shooter failed');   if(allequipmentsmall[allequipmentsmall.length - 1] == ~Super Lockpick~) allequipmentsmall.pop(); /*temporary workaroudn for something really weird: 'Error: Trying to create Equipment 'Super Lockpick' (Super Lockpick) from template but cannot find a matching template in equipment.csv.' it's literally from getequipmentlist though...*/   randeqb = new elements.Equipment(allequipmentsmall.pop());  }  while(randeqc == null # (randeqc.script.indexOf('givedice(') == -1 && randeqc.script.indexOf('.animatereroll') == -1)) {   randeqc = new elements.Equipment(allequipmentsmall.pop());  }    self.equipment = [randeqa|randeqb|randeqc].concat([self.equipment[self.equipment.length - 1]]); /*randomly chosen cards + skillcard*/ }  if(Gadget.getcurrentgadget(self) == ~N/A~) {  trace(~giving gadget~);  Gadget.changegadget(self| Gadget.getcurrentgadget(self) |rand(loadtext('ncrmod/randomstartinggadget'))); }

Equipment: Blessed Wand of Wishing|Blessed Wand of Wishing|Blessed Wand of Wishing
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Blessed Wand of Wishing~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Blessed Wand of Wishing~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: self.setvar(~ncrrobotepisode4~|1); self.setvar(~ncrrobotepisode4wishlist~|[]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Loud Bird~|~Banshee~|~Copycat~|~Bounty Hunter~]); var database = loaddata(~ncrmod/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; Rules.rulescreen(~makeawishrules~);
Script: After Combat: if(!flee && self.name != ~Bear~) { var eqlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment) if(eq.name != ~Wand of Wishing~ && eq.name != ~Blessed Wand of Wishing~ && eq.name != ~Cursed Wand of Wishing~ && eq != self.getskillcard()) eqlist.push(eq); rand(eqlist).name = ~deletethiscard~; removeequipment(~deletethiscard~); }

Description: Manage your inventory the Inventor-y way!|Er... the Robot-y way.
Rules Description: Standard Rules...?
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.excludeenemies([~Banshee~[;]~Loud Bird~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Bounty Hunter~]); if(Rules.jackpotskills.length == 0) { Rules.jackpotskills = [~Regenerate~|~One More Roll~|~N/A~]; } self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; Rules.inventor_inspiration = true; Rules.inventor_setgadgets(1); if(!self.varexists(~mycpu~)) { self.setvar(~mycpu~|9); } self.roll_target = self.getvar(~mycpu~);
Script: After Level Up: if(self.level % 2 == 0) { self.setvar(~mycpu~|self.roll_target + 2); trace(~mycpu: ~ + self.getvar(~mycpu~)); } else trace(~didnt get cpu this levelup~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){  var rewards1 = getcolumn(loaddata(~ncrmod/initialequipment/inventor~)[;] ~rewards1~); rewards1.remove(~Equipment:Bustle~); rewards1.push(~Equipment:Powerball~); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }
Script: Before Start Turn: self.roll_range += 2; /*replace instances of ''change this gadget to gadget B'' to ''indicate to the episode-wide end turn script it should remove this gadget from jackpot skills pool (by using self.innate as temp storage) & put in its place gadget B''. mainly important for ''once'' gadgets which change themselves to broken gadget*/ var checkjackpot = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null|0|null); checkjackpot.repeat(-1); var funccheckjackpot = new hscript.Parser().parseString(~  if(self.doendturnnow) { checkjackpot._repeat = 0; }  else {   var curseamt = 0;  if(self.roll_jackpot > 0 && self.getskillcard() != null && self.getskillcard().skills.length > 0) {    for(skill in self.getskillcard().skills) {   if(skill.name == \~Pure Evil\~) { curseamt++; }   if(skill.name == \~Gadget Roll\~) { skill.description = \~Reroll a dice (uses: 3)\~; } if(skill.name == \~Mirror Smash\~) { skill.description = \~-3 [heart][][;] get dice (uses: 3)\~; }   skill.script = skill.script.split(\~Gadget.changegadget(self| \\\~\~ + skill.name + \~\\\~|\~).join(\~self.innate.push(\\\~\~ + skill.name + \~\\\~); self.innate.push(\~);    } if(curseamt > 0) { self.getskillcard().animate(\~flashandshake\~); self.symbolparticle(\~curse\~); self.addstatus(\~curse\~|curseamt); sfx(\~_curse\~); } checkjackpot._repeat = 0;   }  } ~);  var interp = new hscript.Interp(); interp.variables.set(~self~| self); interp.variables.set(~sfx~| sfx); interp.variables.set(~checkjackpot~| checkjackpot); checkjackpot.onRepeat(interp.execute| [funccheckjackpot]); checkjackpot.move(); self.setvar(~phillip~|false);
Script: On Start Turn: /*for(myskill in Rules.jackpotskills) { if(myskill == ~Pure Evil~) { sfx(~_curse~); self.getskillcard().animate(~flashandshake~); inflictself(CURSE); } }*/
Script: End Turn: trace(~robotventor end turn~); trace(self.innate); trace(Rules.jackpotskills); if(self.innate.length > 0) { for(i in 0...self.innate.length / 2) { var myindex = Rules.jackpotskills.indexOf(self.innate[i * 2]); if(myindex != -1) { trace(~yep~); Rules.jackpotskills.remove(self.innate[i * 2]); Rules.jackpotskills.insert(myindex|self.innate[(i * 2) + 1]);  } } } self.innate = []; trace(Rules.jackpotskills);
Script: Start Combat: var jps = null; if(self.varexists(~jpsbackup~)) jps = self.getvar(~jpsbackup~); else jps = Rules.jackpotskills.copy(); trace(jps); while(jps.indexOf(~Broken Gadget~) != -1) jps.remove(~Broken Gadget~);  jps.unshift(Gadget.getcurrentgadget(self)); trace(jps); while(jps.length > 3) jps.pop(); while(jps.length < 3) jps.push(~Broken Gadget~); trace(jps); Rules.jackpotskills = jps; self.equipment.remove(self.getskillcard()); var calc = self.createskillcard(~Robot Calculate~| []); self.equipment.push(calc); self.roll_target = self.getvar(~mycpu~); self.name = ~Robot~; self.setvar(~underwhelm~|5); var goldgadgets = loadtext(~ncrmod/gadgetsthatshowgold~); for(skill in Rules.jackpotskills) if(goldgadgets.indexOf(skill) != -1) self.getskillcard().addtag(~showgold~);
Script: After Combat: Rules.inventor_inspiration = true; Rules.inventor_setgadgets(1); self.name = ~Inventor~; self.equipment.remove(self.getskillcard()); var gadg = self.createskillcard(~Inventor Gadgets~| [~Broken Gadget~]); self.equipment.push(gadg); self.roll_target = self.getvar(~mycpu~); self.setvar(~jpsbackup~|Rules.jackpotskills.copy());

Description: Everything from the Lite round[;]|plus some all-new remix rules.
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Equipment: Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Bop Bop|Bop Bop|Bop Bop|Veneer|Veneer
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment(loadtext(~ncrmod/initialequipment/jester~)); leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~ncrmod/jesterpacks/packs_ncr~)[;] 2); var testerlist = [~Wisp~|~Cactus~|~Wicker Man~|~Aoife~|~Wolf Puppy~|~Robobot~|~Alchemist~|~Gardener~|~Haunted Jar~]; shuffle(testerlist); var testers = [testerlist.pop()|testerlist.pop()]; leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Smoke Signal~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + testers[0] + ~[]~[;]~Equipment:~ + testers[1] + ~[]~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + testers[0] + ~?~[;]~Equipment:~ + testers[1] + ~?~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Smoke Signal~);

Description: NCR equipment and rules are now integrated|into standard Bonus Round!
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var vanillalist = loadtext(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/jester~); var pulist = vanillalist.splice(0|3); var normallist = vanillalist; var ncrlist = loadtext(~ncrmod/initialequipment/jester~); chooseinitialequipment([rand(normallist)|rand(pulist)|rand(ncrlist)]); var dicemaker = rand([~Equipment:Subdivide~[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~[;]~Equipment:Smoke Signal~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~diceydungeons/jesterpacks/packs_bonusround~).concat(loadtext(~ncrmod/jesterpacks/packs_ncr~))[;] 2); var testerlist = [~Wisp~|~Cactus~|~Wicker Man~|~Aoife~|~Wolf Puppy~|~Robobot~|~Alchemist~|~Gardener~|~Haunted Jar~]; shuffle(testerlist); var testers = [testerlist.pop()|testerlist.pop()]; var douselist = [~Call for Backup Thief~|~Call for Backup Robot~|~Call for Backup Inventor~|~Call for Backup Witch~|~Jester~]; /*jester is a narcissist now i guess?*/ shuffle(douselist); var douses = [douselist.pop()|douselist.pop()]; var middleisdouse = rand([false|true]); leveluprewards(3[;] dicemaker); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + testers[0] + ~[]~[;]~Equipment:~ + (middleisdouse ? testers[1] + ~[]~ : douses[0])      [;]~Equipment:~ + douses[1]]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + testers[0] + ~?~ [;]~Equipment:~ + (middleisdouse ? testers[1]        : douses[0]) + ~?~[;]~Equipment:~ + douses[1] + ~?~]); leveluprewards(6[;] dicemaker);
Script: Start Game: Rules.remix = true; Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~jester6~)); if(self.equipment.length <= 2) { trace(~starting deck filler actuator~); var actdeckfiller = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null|0|null); actdeckfiller.repeat(-1); var funcdeckfiller = new hscript.Parser().parseString(~  if(Deck == null # self == null # self.equipment == null # self.name != \~Jester\~) { trace(\~stopping deck filler actuator\~); actdeckfiller._repeat = 0; }  else if(Deck.getcardlist(\~all\~).length > 0) {   trace(Deck.getcardlist(\~all\~)[0]);   var eqname = \~InitialEquipment:\~ + Deck.getcardlist(\~all\~)[0];   var itemstoadd = [];   if(normallist.indexOf(eqname) >= 0)    itemstoadd = [\~Boop\~|\~Boop\~|\~Boop\~|\~Boop\~|\~Bop\~|\~Bop\~|\~Bop\~|\~Sweets\~|\~Sweets\~];   else if(pulist.indexOf(eqname) >= 0)    itemstoadd = [\~Kapow\~|\~Kapow\~|\~Kapow\~|\~Kapow\~|\~Blammo\~|\~Blammo\~|\~Blammo\~|\~Sour Candy\~|\~Sour Candy\~];   else if(ncrlist.indexOf(eqname) >= 0)    itemstoadd = [\~Zoop Zoop\~|\~Zoop Zoop\~|\~Zoop Zoop\~|\~Zoop Zoop\~|\~Bop Bop\~|\~Bop Bop\~|\~Bop Bop\~|\~Veneer\~|\~Veneer\~];   if(itemstoadd.length > 0) {    eqname = eqname.split(\~InitialEquipment:\~)[1];    var s = new elements.Skill(\~Against all odds_old\~);    s.script = \~     for(item in \~ + itemstoadd.toString().split(\~[\~).join(\~[\\\~\~).split(\~|\~).join(\~\\\~|\\\~\~).split(\~]\~).join(\~\\\~]\~) + \~)      addjestercard(item);    \~;    s.execute(self|self);    trace(\~done\~);   } else { trace(\~can't fill deck??\~); }   actdeckfiller._repeat = 0;  } ~);  var vanillalist = loadtext(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/jester~);  var interp = new hscript.Interp(); interp.variables.set(~self~| self); interp.variables.set(~Deck~| Deck); interp.variables.set(~pulist~| vanillalist.splice(0|3)); interp.variables.set(~normallist~| vanillalist); interp.variables.set(~ncrlist~| loadtext(~ncrmod/initialequipment/jester~)); interp.variables.set(~actdeckfiller~| actdeckfiller); interp.variables.set(~trace~| trace); actdeckfiller.onRepeat(interp.execute| [funcdeckfiller]); actdeckfiller.move(); }
